comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Milan Rodic (Crvena zvezda) was quite harsh and Benoit Bastien didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: What a hit! Milos Vulic (Crvena zvezda) shows good composure inside the box to fire a first-time shot into the bottom right corner. 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Marko Marin (Crvena zvezda) decides to strike the ball towards goal, but his effort fails to threaten the goalkeeper after being blocked by one of the defenders. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. FK Crvena zvezda will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Richmond Boakye (Crvena zvezda) jumped highest inside the box to meet a perfectly executed corner kick by Marko Marin. His header went in off the right post, giving the goalkeeper no chance. It's 3:1.
